import React, { useState } from 'react' import Interface from './Vue/Interface/Interface' import Addition from './Vue/Addition/Addition' import ContactForm from './Vue/Upload/Upload' const App = () => { const usersData = [ ] const [users, setUsers] = useState(usersData) const addUser = user => { user.id = users.length + 1 setUsers([...users, user]) } return (
) } export default App
